I’m a Quantitative Analyst at [Societe Generale](https://www.societegenerale.com) in Paris, working on climate credit risk modeling with the RISQ/MDL/MOD team. 
I graduated with an engineering degree in Financial Engineering from ENSIMAG and Msc in Quantitative Finance from IAE Grenoble, specializing in quantitative finance, stochastic calculus, and derivatives.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies and problem-solving. I’m also passionate about sharing knowledge and contributing to the finance and tech communities.

**Interests:** Algorithmic trading, Quantitative Finance, Algorithm Development, Financial Technology, Continuous Learning 


## Inquiries
If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to [contact me](mailto:isselmouo4@gmail.com). I am always interested in discussing workshop offerings and collaborative opportunities.
